Inbound payments are expected to be in files containing batches of one or several payments or for a single payment. features.evidence: When according to the rules in Payment Hub payment becomes routed to billing, billing performs validations according to the business rule [BR>Automated payment validation in billing] and if it passes accepts and allocates a payment according to the configuration settings that are available for the particular bill type and payment allocation mode. If payment gets rejected (e.g. billing account was not found), then billing rejects such payment and sends rejection reason back to Payment Hub subsystem where this payment gets suspended in General Suspense with reason defined by billing subsystem.
